title: Basti, my BFF
description: Amanda is frequently bullied when her dog turns into the coolest guy ever. Now she gets invited to parties and hangs out with the cool kids. But her new life turns into a real mess when the guy she´s with keeps acting out his doggy behavoir. Amanda misses her old life and her beloved dog. With the help of her neighbour, autistic John, she tries to get her dog back. The transformation is tricky. And does he really want to be a dog again?A book about norms and unwritten rules. For doglovers, young and old.
author: Karin Svärd
